mapper.insert: INSERT INTO us ( userName, password, name, phone, email, birth, gender ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender} )
mapper.update: UPDATE us SET user_name=#{userName}, password=#{password}, name=#{name}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, birth=#{birth}, gender=#{gender} WHERE user_id=#{userId}
